title: 40: Minicast - Conversational Klingon
itunes:title: 40: Minicast - Conversational Klingon
itunes:subtitle: Matt talks to Marc Okrand about cursing in Klingon. The fictional Star Trek language that has become nearly as popular as the franchise itself.
description:
